com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.entity.systems

Class SpriteAnimationSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.ashley.core.EntitySystem
      • com.badlogic.ashley.systems.IteratingSystem
        • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.entity.systems.ZbeSystem
          • com.squidtopusstudios.zerobitengine.core.entity.systems.SpriteAnimationSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class SpriteAnimationSystem
extends ZbeSystem
    Sprite Animation System for Ashley Entities. Handles the updating of animation frames.

      • createAnimationFrames

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] createAnimationFrames(ZbeEntity entity,
                                                                  java.lang.String framesName,
                                                                  com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteSheet,
                                                                  int columns,
                                                                  int rows)
        Creates and registers an array of frames from a sprite sheet. Retrieve with getAnimFrames(name); Designed to be used with createAnimation() for sprite sheets with multiple animations.
        Parameters:
        entity - ZbeEntity instance
        framesName - name for the frames
        spriteSheet - animation sprite sheet. Assumes all frames are of equal size. //TODO explicit sizing
        columns - number of columns in the sprite sheet
        rows - number of rows in the sprite sheet
        Returns:
        the created array of frames

      • createAnimation

        public ZbeAnimation createAnimation(ZbeEntity entity,
                           java.lang.String animName,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion... frames)
        Creates and registers a new animation from the provided frames. The animation can be retrieved by name using getAnimation(name);
        Parameters:
        entity - ZbeEntity instance
        animName - name to register the animation under
        frames - frames to create an animation from
        Returns:
        the created animation

      • createAnimation

        public ZbeAnimation createAnimation(ZbeEntity entity,
                           java.lang.String animName,
                           com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture spriteSheet,
                           int columns,
                           int rows)
        Creates and registers a new animation from a sprite sheet for the particular animation. The animation can be retrieved by name using getAnimation(name); Note that animation frames are automatically created and registered with the name 'animName_frames'
        Parameters:
        entity - ZbeEntity instance
        animName - name to register the animation under. The animation frames are registered with the name 'animName_frames'
        spriteSheet - animation sprite sheet. Assumes all frames are of equal size. //TODO explicit sizing
        columns - number of columns in the sprite sheet
        rows - number of rows in the sprite sheet
        Returns:
        the created animation

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(ZbeEntity entity,
                java.lang.String name)
        Set the currently playing animation
        Parameters:
        entity - ZbeEntity instance
        name - name of the registered animation to set
